scripts.test: NODE_PATH=./src mocha --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/*/test.js
scripts.test-block: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/block/*.js
scripts.test-script: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/script/interpreter.js
scripts.test-base: npm run test-other && npm run test-crypto && npm run test-encoding && npm run test-util
scripts.test-other: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/*-spec.js
scripts.test-privatekey: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/privatekey.js
scripts.test-publickey: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/publickey.js
scripts.test-crypto: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/crypto/*.js
scripts.test-encoding: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/encoding/*.js
scripts.test-util: NODE_PATH=./src mocha $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --reporter spec src/lib/test/util/*.js
